featured.text: Lost and scared, the little dog ______ along the streets, looking for its master.
Also, the masters become so lazy that, after a while, they lose their muscles, and they become too weak ___(30)___ to feed themselves.
Moran began painting by age 15, inspired by the landscape paintings of the British master J.M.W. Turner.

other.text: The skill of playing the glass armonica was very hard to master.
He mastered the instrument and took it to parties and gatherings to play for his friends and acquaintances.
Upon hearing its master’s call, the dog wagged its tail, and followed her out of the room _____.

definition.zh_def: 大師；專家；主人；精通某種技能的人
definition.en_def: A person who has control or authority over something; an expert in a particular field.
definition.example: She is a master of classical piano.
